name: Aytrin
description:
Play as Aytrin, the wall climbing bird. Use arrow keys to move, press Space to jump, and press Z to dive. Crouching lets Aytrin walk around slowly. Releasing the crouch button right as Aytrin hits the ground makes them jump far away. Pressing against a wall while airborne lets Aytrin run up the wall and pressing jump while running on a wall leaps them off of it.

Most artwork is not mine, only Aytrin's spritework is for now. This game is incomplete.
